Flipkart
Grocery
Flipkart({{items}})
Grocery
import { Component,OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-kart', templateUrl: './kart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./kart.component.css'] }) export class KartComponent implements OnInit{ items=0; length="default"; ngOnInit(): void { let localitems=localStorage.getItem('localUser'); if(localitems){ this.items=JSON.parse(localitems).length if(localitems.length>0){ this.length='local' } } } }
